org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.valuefunctions

Class QFeatureFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.datastructures.WeightsVector
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.valuefunctions.QFeatureFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, FeatureFunctionObserver, DifferentiableFunction, DifferentiableQFunction, LinearFunctionApproximator, QFunction

    public class QFeatureFunction
extends WeightsVector
implements DifferentiableQFunction, LinearFunctionApproximator, Serializable
    The QFeatureFunction is a linear function approximation. It uses 1 FeatureModifer for all actions. Each action has it's "own" weights.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
